doc.after: Its automotive industry, the world's second fastest growing, increased domestic sales by 26% during 2009â10,[220] and exports by 36% during 2008â09.[221] Power capacity is 250 gigawatts, of which 8% is renewable. At the end of 2011, the Indian IT industry employed 2.8 million professionals, generated revenues close to US$100 billion equalling 7.5% of Indian GDP and contributed 26% of India's merchandise exports.[222]
